title: Hezbollah hits Israeli outpost with “accuracy”
description: Lebanon’s Hezbollah said it had launched a multi-drone attack on an Israeli air defense outpost in the occupied Golan Heights.

title: Rights groups: Israel failed to comply with ICJ ruling
description: Twelve of Israel’s most prominent human rights organizations have signed an open letter accusing the regime of failing to comply with the International Court of Justice’s (ICJ) provisional ruling that it should facilitate access to humanitarian aid in Gaza.

title: UN chief calls for lifesaving aid deliveries to Gaza
description: United Nations Secretary-General Antonio Guterres on Monday called for a truce in Israel’s war on Gaza.

title: Jordan warns Israel against Al-Aqsa restrictions
description: The Jordanian foreign minister has warned that restrictions imposed by Israel on Muslim worshippers’ access to Jerusalem’s Al-Aqsa Mosque compound during the fasting month of Ramadan will push the situation towards an “explosion”.

title: Hungary PM: Trump won’t give a penny to Ukraine
description: Donald Trump will not fund Ukraine's fight against Russia's invasion if he is elected US president again, Hungarian PM Viktor Orban has said.

title: India moves to implement anti-Muslim law
description: The Indian government has notified the rules for the Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA), weeks before Prime Minister Narendra Modi seeks a rare third term for his Hindu nationalist government.

title: Iran aims to develop defense systems aligning with global standards
description: TEHRAN - The deputy commander of Iran's Air Defense Force has disclosed ongoing efforts to develop state-of-the-art defense systems in accordance with new global standards.

title: The West is looking for an excuse to sanction Iran
description: TEHRAN - In a note, Hamshahri discussed the approach of the Western media toward Iran and said: The Western media is gradually creating an international consensus on various excuses against Iran.

title: Iranian Defense Ministry launches largest lithium battery production project
description: TEHRAN - The Iranian Ministry of Defense inaugurated its cutting-edge lithium battery pack production line on Monday.

title: Army’s cutting-edge drones enhance deterrence capabilities: top officer
description: TEHRAN - The Iranian Army’s cutting-edge drone system has been a source of global acclaim for the country which underscores the nation's deterrence capabilities, the Air Defense Force deputy chief said on Monday.

title: Iranian diplomat slams foreign ambassadors' silence on Israel’s atrocities in Gaza
description: TEHRAN - Rasoul Mousavi, Director General of the South Asian Affairs Department at Iran’s Foreign Ministry, has criticized certain foreign ambassadors based in Tehran for their perceived hypocrisy in remaining silent about the Israeli massacre of Palestinian women in Gaza.

title: National Iranian Ethnic Film Festival to make debut in Iran
description: TEHRAN- The inaugural edition of the National Ethnic Iranian Film Festival is set to take place in Tehran in May.

title: “The Meaning of Life and the Great Philosophers” published in Persian
description: TEHRAN-The Persian translation of the book “The Meaning of Life and the Great Philosophers” has been recently released in the bookstores across Iran.

title: Video art “Sculpture” wins at HALO International Film Festival
description: TEHRAN-The video art “Sculpture” by Iranian artist Ramin Hosseinpour is among the shining winners of January-March 2024 round of the HALO International Film Festival in Saint-Petersburg, Russia.

title: Literary achievements celebrated at closing ceremony of Nezami Ganjavi commemoration
description: TEHRAN- The third edition of the national and international commemoration of Persian poet Nezami Ganjavi concluded with a closing ceremony at Tehran’s Vahdat Hall on Sunday.

title: Air Defense commander assesses combat readiness as he visits southern Iran
description: TEHRAN - The commander of the Iranian Army’s Air Defense Force conducted a comprehensive inspection of the Siraf Air Defense Group and its various sections in southern Iran on Monday.

title: Leader awards Fath Medal to Army and IRGC chiefs
description: TEHRAN- Ayatollah Seyed Ali Khamenei, Leader of the Islamic Revolution and the Commander-in-Chief of the Iranian Armed Forces, has awarded the “Fath Medal” to Major General Sayyid Abdolrahim Mousavi, the chief commander of the Army, and Major General Hossein Salami, the chief commander of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps [IRGC].

title: Iran, China, and Russia to start joint naval drill on Tuesday
description: TEHRAN- Iran, China, and Russia are set to conduct a joint naval exercise in the northern Indian Ocean, commencing on Tuesday.

title: Islamophobia and Zionism
description: MADRID- The purpose of this article is to explain how the "Islamic question" has acquired a central importance in the discourse of the European far right.

title: Iran to preside over Conference on Disarmament
description: TEHRAN- The Islamic Republic of Iran will serve as chair of the UN Conference on Disarmament (also known as CD) on next Monday (March 18).

title: U.S. main culprit in initiating, waging war on Gaza: diplomat
description: TEHRAN- The spokesman for Iran’s Foreign Ministry has said that the Israeli attacks on the Palestinian people in the Gaza Strip were primarily initiated and sustained by the United States.

title: A sad Ramadan for Gaza as Israel continues attacks
description:
In the midst of Israel’s war, the people of Gaza don’t feel the joy of the holy month.

Ramadan is a holy month for Muslims, with people decorating their homes, buying things for special Ramadan dishes, and planning gatherings with family and friends to break their fast together.

title: Ramadan in Gaza Is Eclipsed by Israeli Savagery, Starvation
description: TEHRAN - The tragic plight and unimaginable suffering of Palestinian people in the Gaza Strip have been further highlighted as the Muslim holy month of Ramadan begins.

title: Tehran prepares to host diverse art, cultural festivals in coming year
description: TEHRAN- Tehran province to host multiple art and cultural festivals during the upcoming Persian year commencing on March 21, the Director of the General Directorate of Culture and Guidance of the province has said.

title: Habermas: Detesting Hitlerite Nazism and embracing Zionist Nazism
description: German philosopher and social theorist Jürgen Habermas shocked many, particularly academic figures, for defending Israel’s extremely disproportionate retaliatory attacks on the Gaza Strip following an attack on southern Israel by Hamas on October 7.

title: Habermas: Rejecting Hitlerite Nazism and embracing Zionist Nazism
description: German philosopher and social theorist Jürgen Habermas shocked many, particularly academic figures, for defending Israel’s extremely disproportionate retaliatory attacks on the Gaza Strip following an attack on southern Israel by Hamas on October 7.

title: What has been the big scheme of Israel and the Biden goons?…
description: Biden and Western lies about intentions are a cruel joke. As were the U.S. airdrops of 38,000 tiny meals for starving Palestinians which actually killed five children in Gaza because some of the parachutes did not open and the meals crates attached fell on scrambling children rushing to grab something to eat. But that’s not nearly all.

title: UNESCO-listed caravanserai hosting Nowruz festival
description: TEHRAN - Semnan's department for cultural heritage, tourism, and handicrafts has announced the inauguration of a Nowruz festival, titled “Semnan, Home of World Heritage Caravanserais,” being held at the city’s Shah Abbasi Caravanserai.

title: Eight Iranian crafters honored at WCC-APR
description: TEHRAN – In a distinguished event, held in China, eight accomplished artisans hailing from Iran have emerged as the standout figures selected by the World Crafts Council-Asia Pacific Region (WCC-APR).

title: Museum of Iranian entrepreneurs inaugurated in Tehran
description: TEHRAN – On Sunday, a museum dedicated to Iranian entrepreneurs was inaugurated within the vast premises of Tehran’s Qasr Garden Museum.

title: Iranian province records 90 million overnight stays in 11 months
description: TEHRAN—Mazandaran province, which is bounded by mountains and sea, has registered some 90 million overnight stays mainly by domestic travelers in the first eleven months of the current Iranian calendar year (started on March 21).

title: Historical carriages, chariots on show at Tehran car museum
description: TEHRAN – A special section dedicated to historical carriages and chariots was officially inaugurated at Iran's National Car Museum, which is located in western Tehran.

title: Esteghlal, Persepolis players visit kids with cancer
description: TEHRAN – Esteghlal and Persepolis football teams’ players visited children with cancer in a hospital in Tehran, capital of Iran on Monday.

title: China to take a large number of measures for boosting employment: minister
description: TEHRAN- As Chinese Minister of Human Resources and Social Security Wang Xiaoping has said, the country will take many measures to boost employment.

title: TEDPIX falls 1,350 points on Monday
description: TEHRAN - TEDPIX, the main index of the Tehran Stock Exchange (TSE), fell 1,350 points on Monday to stand at 2,161,575.

title: Iran-U.S. trade grows 240% in January
description: TEHRAN - The U.S. Bureau of Statistics, in its latest report, pointed to a 240 percent growth in the trade exchanges between Iran and the United States in January 2024.

title: Annual foreign investment in Iran tops $4b
description: TEHRAN - The value of foreign investment in Iran has reached more than $4.0 billion, the head of the Organization of Investment, Economic and Technical Assistant of Iran (OIETAI) announced.

title: New loading platform launched at Iran’s Imam Khomeini port
description: TEHRAN - Iran has launched a new loading platform at Imam Khomeini port in the southern Iranian province of Khuzestan to enhance commodity transmission further, IRNA reported.

title: Sanctions, sabotage acts failed to halt Iran’s oil industry progress: Oji
description: TEHRAN - Iran’s Oil Minister Javad Oji has said that sanctions and acts of sabotage have failed to stop the country’s progress in the oil industry, with the Islamic Republic now exporting its oil to any destination it wants.

title: Exports via Iran’s Kermanshah up 23% in 11 months
description: TEHRAN - Exports from the western Iranian province of Kermanshah increased 23 percent in the first 11 months of the current Iranian calendar year ending on March 19, a provincial official said on Monday.

title: ‘Iran’s GDP can triple in medium term’
description: TEHRAN – Deputy Head of Iran Chamber of Commerce, Industries, Mines, and Agriculture (ICCIMA) Mohammadreza Bahraman said Iran has the potential to triple its GDP in the medium term, the ICCIMA portal reported.

title: Rainfall declines compared to last year
description: TEHRAN – The amount of rainfall in the country has decreased by 26 and 16 percent, respectively, compared to last year’s long-term average, and the previous water year.

title: Over $4.3b allocated to subsidize medical imports
description: TEHRAN – More than $4.3 billion has been allocated for importing medicine and medical equipment in the current Iranian calendar year that ends on March 20.

title: Iran to pursue Israel’s expulsion from UN commission on women
description: TEHRAN – In light of the extreme deterioration of the situation in Gaza, the vice president for women and family affairs attending the 68th Commission on the Status of Women (CSW) will call for removing Israel from the UN body.

title: Traditional medicine recommends healthy diet during Ramadan
description: TEHRAN - Considering its several thousand years of history and its emphasis on improving lifestyle and maintaining health, Iranian traditional medicine has a rich capacity to promote self-care, especially during the holy month of Ramadan.

title: Nekoulal Azad elected head of Iran's Deaf Sports Federation
description: TEHRAN - Mostafa Nekoulal Azad was elected as head of Iran's Deaf Sports Federation for a four-year term till 2028 on Monday.

title: Iranian Family Lawyers Explain Child Support Enforcement
description: IranianAttorney.org - Child support enforcement and financial responsibility are integral aspects of family law that aim to ensure the well-being of children following the dissolution of a relationship.
